titles.title: CAUTION Act
CAUTION Act
Colombia Assistance Used Transparently by Institutionalizing Oversight Now Act of 2022
A bill to condition civil and military assistance to the Government of Colombia on certain recurring certifications from the Secretary of State.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Colombia Assistance Used Transparently by Institutionalizing Oversight Now Act of 2022 or the CAUTION Act
This bill sets conditions on the provision of civil or military assistance to Colombia.
